title: So-called West Church in Apollonia
description: A large architectural complex that includes a three-aisled church with a projecting western apse, a small atrium, a baptistery, and other structures built up against the inner face of the western stretch of the city wall of Apollonia.

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the ruins of the so-called West Church in Apollonia (modern Marsa Susa), adjacent to the western stretch of the city walls.
properties.title: OSM location of the so-called West Church in Apollonia
